|rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2528; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''Speakers for iPod with Internet Radio'' [http://www.asus.com/Internet_Radio/AIR3/ Product page] - ASUS AIR3 ([https://fccid.io/MSQ/AIR3 MSQAIR3])
[http://www.asus.com/Internet_Radio/AIR/ Product page] - ASUS AIR ([https://fccid.io/MSQ/AIR MSQAIR]) :HDSS (High Definition Sound Standard) :ETL (Embedded Transmission Line) WLAN Card: ''[[Senao]]'' NUB-3701 Module (ASUS) - 0.10 LPF :PN:5216A0195000 ===Features=== :- Universal iPod Spaker with charger :- Video out from iPod touch and other iPod :- Aux In from other devices :- More than 10.000 internet worldwide radio stations :- 250 favorite radio stations :- Playing music from your PC through UPnP protocol :- Internet weather forecast and financial infromation :- Alarm Clock with Nap ===Specifications=== *Connectivity: Wireless LAN 802.11b/g, Wired 10/100M Ethernet *Data Rates: 54 Mbits (WLAN), 10 Mbits (Ethernet) *Wireless LAN Security: 64/128-bit WEP,WPA *Audio Format Decoder: MP3/WMA (16~320Kbps) *SNR: >90 dB Earphone *Display: 128x64 FSTN Graphics Display (Blue color) *I/O Port: Headphone Jack (3.5mm), Line In (3.5mm), :S-Video / Composite Video Outs, Ethernet (RJ45) *Speaker: :2x 1" Silk Dome Tweeter 3W (5 Ohm) :2x 3.5" Woofer 15W (4 Ohm) *AC Power Adaptor: :Input: 100-240V (50-60Hz) 1.7A :Output: DC 20V/2A *Remote Control: IR (26 keys) *Dimension: 408mm x 170mm x 170mm (LxWxH) *Weight: 3.5 kg (device only) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/asus-air3-high-definition-speakers-for-ipod-with-internet-radio/6345.html ''ASUS AIR3 High Definition Speakers for iPod with Internet Radio'' on '''VR-Zone'''] *[http://www.engadget.com/2008/12/26/asus-officially-launches-ipod-friendly-air3-internet-radio/ ''ASUS officially launches iPod-friendly AIR3 internet radio'' on '''Engadget'''] *[http://www.overclockzone.com/tor_za/year_2009/04/asus_air3/ ''ASUS AIR3 - Asus Internet Radio'' on '''OverClockZone'''] *[http://itc.ua/news/air3_pervaya_zvukovaya_sistema_asus_s_sertifikatom_hdss_34985/ ''ASUS AIR3'' on '''ITC'''] (RU) ==See also== *[[Aluratek Wi-Fi Internet Radio (AIRMM03F)]] • [https://www.exploitee.rs/index.php/Aluratek_WiFi_Radio​ Spec.] *[[ASUS Internet Radio (AIR)]] *[[ASUS Internet Radio 3 (AIR3)]] *[[Linksys WiFi Internet Radio (WML11B)]] *[[Logitech Squeezebox Radio]] *[[Logic3 Scuderia FS1 Air]] *[[Philips Fidelio SoundSphere (DS6800W)]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
